name: GravTrap
description:
Get a high score by avoiding obstacles and collecting coins in this 2D platformer with randomly generated levels, where you can jump around and change the direction of gravity.

Controls: Press [SPACE] to jump and press the Left Mouse Button to change gravity. You can also use [W] and [S] to jump or get down faster, depending on the direction of gravity.

Acknowledgements: Sci-Fi Sprites by pzUH:
https://opengameart.org/content/free-sci-fi-platformer-game-tileset.

ScoreSpace Jam 2019 Submission
Theme: 'Gravity'
